agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Monday, April 29, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 31 Longoria | et al. Relating to operation of the Texas leverage fund program administered by the Texas Economic Development Bank. HB 227 Krause Relating to exempting the intrastate manufacture of a firearm, a firearm accessory, or ammunition from federal regulation. HB 4753 Lopez Relating to a study regarding the cost of child care in this state in comparison to wages. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. Bills added after last posting: HB 4753 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
